text: manusyare, ninnal ninnalute raksitavine suksikkuka. oru pitavum tanre santanattin prayeajanam ceyyatta, oru santatiyum pitavin ottum prayeajanakariyavatta oru divasatte ninnal bhayappetukayum ceyyuka. tirccayayum allahuvinre vagdanam satyamakunnu. atinal aihikajivitam ninnale vanciccu kalayatirikkatte. paramavancakanaya pisacum allahuvinre karyattil ninnale vanciccu kalayatirikkatte
